mapper.insert: insert into challenge_user(no,chg_user_date,chg_no,member_no,chg_status_code) select * from challenge_list where chg_status_code='END' and to_char(chg_list_date,'yy/mm/dd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yy/mm/dd') and member_no=#{member_no}
mapper.select: select chg_no,chg_user_date,chg_title,chg_content from challenge_user cu,challenge c where cu.chg_no=c.no and to_char(chg_user_date,'yy/mm/dd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yy/mm/dd') and member_no=#{member_no}
